doc.title: Infantry Charge
doc.plot: "A familiar scene in the Philippine war where constant and harassing attacks and ambushes form the chief weapon of defense the insurgents employ against the Americans. A bugler is seen to rush from the tents sounding the call to arms, the boys rush out, pick up their arms and dash out of sight. This show of force daunts the enemy, for our force return in a short time, stack their arms and go back to their tents."
